name: Death Race - Win or Die
description:
Something happen and nobody know what exactly it was, everyone screaming, running and trying to leave as soon as possible. Take your car and run away, avoid others on the road. You either will survive or die in agony

Features:
- 20 unique survivors cars in wide range from sedan to war truck
- customizable wheels and stats
- a lot of cars on the road who also want to survive

Enjoy playing Death Race
